item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: June 23, 2024 Today's Verse Ephesians 4:26–27 [26] Be angry and do not sin; do not let the sun go down on your anger, [27] and give no opportunity to the devil. Today's Memory Verse James 1:22 - But be doers of the word, and not hearers only, deceiving yourselves. John 14:6 - Jesus said to him, “I am the way, and the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.
